content: a day like today is for you to let your mind unwind like you ought to feel the earth turn round when your heart rate slows contemplating the thing only your heart knows that life s not a race 311 life s not a race https //youtu be/y6tflufhnze life s not a race but sometimes it s fun to go fast the life s not a race crochet blanket is easy speedy fluffy fun a simple stitch lets the colors do all of the talking perfect for quick gifts the stitch pattern is all double_crochet us terms in between the stitches so easy this is a great pattern for crocheting in dark rooms while watching television or caretaking on road trips or for crocheters with limited sight photo tutorial included in the pattern this beginner level 1-day or weekend project is designed for self-striping dk weight yarn such as lion brand mandala yarn requires 4 cakes of mandala yarn or 2 360 yards 2 160 meters of any yarn the yarn cakes do not have to match and this is a great pattern for unique cakes mandalacorns the blanket uses double_crochet stitches in us terms and dk weight yarn held doubled experienced crocheters in a hurry can make it in 4 to 5 hours or less no rush though life s not a race the blanket grows quickly even if you relax and take your time watch the video tutorial on youtube https //youtu be/mt6xjggwqkq join the pretty peaceful people crochet group on facebook for more free patterns https //www facebook com/groups/492055481562505 share your project with **#lifesnotarace** on instagram and post it in our pretty peaceful people group on facebook tag @prettypeacefulcrochet too ♥☺ happy crocheting susan of pretty peaceful please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern if you give design credit as life s not a race crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or the video tutorial thank you for your support
